title: Hour 3 Reggie Miller
itunes:title: Hour 3 Reggie Miller
description:
Reggie Miller talks to Dan about the NBA playoffs picture. Reggie says the Warriors were good before Steve Kerr got there, but Steve Kerr is not under-rated.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
